attributes.name: Helm of a Thousand Whispers
attributes.description: "Do you hear the voices too?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Do you hear the voices too?"

attributes.name: Helm of Rogue Justice
attributes.description: "Do not wait for the law. Take matters into your own hands."
attributes.parsed_description: "Do not wait for the law. Take matters into your own hands."

attributes.name: Helm of the Dominator
attributes.description: "Worn by the corrupted General Gortan, his crushing control over the legions he commanded led to a mutiny that resulted in his undoing."
attributes.parsed_description: "Worn by the corrupted General Gortan, his crushing control over the legions he commanded led to a mutiny that resulted in his undoing."

attributes.name: Helm of the Forgotten Legion
attributes.description: "The Legion came from Rome centuries ago. They tried to return home time and time again, each time landing back on the shores of Aeternum."
attributes.parsed_description: "The Legion came from Rome centuries ago. They tried to return home time and time again, each time landing back on the shores of Aeternum."

attributes.name: Helm of the Huntsman
attributes.description: "Blessed are the fields in which the huntsman gather."
attributes.parsed_description: "Blessed are the fields in which the huntsman gather."

attributes.name: Helm of Tribulation
attributes.description: "This too shall pass."
attributes.parsed_description: "This too shall pass."

attributes.name: Helmschmid Cuisses
attributes.description: "In heavy steps, an emergent slip, sanity fell and lost its grip."
attributes.parsed_description: "In heavy steps, an emergent slip, sanity fell and lost its grip."

attributes.name: Herald's Finger Curse
attributes.description: "Beware the Herald when he points at you. For it is then that you know you have been forsaken."
attributes.parsed_description: "Beware the Herald when he points at you. For it is then that you know you have been forsaken."
